title: LIVE! in Atlanta: "The Vishakanya's Choice" by Roshani Chokshi
description: After spending years in isolation with her vishakanya sisters, a poison maiden is given her first deadly mission. © 2015 Roshani Chokshi, as first appeared on BookSmugglers.com. Recorded live at Variety Playhouse in Atlanta, with musical accompaniment by Anand Vyas.
author: originals+lbr@stitcher.com (LeVar Burton and Stitcher)
